title: 1999/164/EC: Commission Decision of 17 February 1999 concerning the non-inclusion of DNOC of active substance in Annex I to Council Directive 91/414/EEC and the withdrawal of authorisations for plant protection products containing this active substance (notified under document number C(1999) 332) (Text with EEA relevance)
header:
COMMISSION DECISION of 17 February 1999 concerning the non-inclusion of DNOC of active substance in Annex I to Council Directive 91/414/EEC and the withdrawal of authorisations for plant protection products containing this active substance (notified under document number C(1999) 332) (Text with EEA relevance) (1999/164/EC)
THE COMMISSION OF THE EUROPEAN COMMUNITIES
main_body: DNOC is not included as active substance in Annex I to Directive 91/414/EEC.

Member States shall grant a period of grace for disposal, storage, placing on the market and use of existing stocks in accordance with the provisions of Article 4(6) of Directive 91/414/EEC, which is as short as possible and not longer than 15 months from the date of notification of the present Decision.
This Decision is addressed to the Member States.
